entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
